title: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in Java editor
description: Reverting a file is slower than closing and reopening it in the Java editor.
OB: When I answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog and double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it, the file reopens quickly. However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the editor window with the original content.
